document.full_text: ford motor co  chief executive alan mulally made about $1.7 million through a stock option that kicked in after ford shares traded above $15 a share for 30 straight days, the automaker said on friday.
document.title: ford's mulally makes $1.7 million on stock option
lines_and_colors: ford motor co  chief executive alan mulally made about $1.7 million through a stock option that kicked in after ford shares traded above $15 a share for 30 straight days, the automaker said on friday.
